name: Untitled Puzzle Platformer
description:
Submission for the Thinky Games Are For Everyone Jam.

For this jam I challenged myself not to rely on spicy art, and instead attempt to create something engaging with just geometric shapes. Really happy with the result, and I might end up developing this into a full game later.

I've kept in a couple of debug keys in case you run into any issues: Q for Quit and R for Reset.

Music from Cymatics.fm
